text: Moses Osirizir Araziba, akam e gasaragha, en arazir kuraba aghurigha azenim gatɨ, egha e gamima e an akam ko an gavgavimɨn apengan iti. Ezɨ e gasir akar kaba God bar da batoke, egha uaghan Moses Osirizir Araziba isa Iesusɨn ter ighuvimɨn a gafu, egha tuavir kamɨn Moses Osirizir Arazibar gavgavim a gɨfa.
